title: What caused supply of watches to shift left

content.question: A leftward shift in the supply curve of watches could be caused by

choices.label: an increase in the price of watches
an increase in wages paid to workers who produce watches
an improvement in the technology associated with watchmaking
a decrease in the price of parts used in the production of watches

content.answer: an increase in wages paid to workers who produce watches

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
